blog.description:
A Tribute To The Most Inspiring and

Fascinating Heroes of The Marvel Universe -

The SuperWomen!

It's the Women of Marvel who had the most to overcome! Sexism, prejudice, sexual stereotype, discrimination against race, religion and sexual orientation etc. Oh, and supervillains!

summary: 365 Marvel Villain paper cut-outs - one villain, every day, all year. March 18th - The Crimson Dynamo  The original Crimson...
caption:
365 Marvel Villain paper cut-outs - one villain, every day, all year.

March 18th - The Crimson Dynamo 

The original Crimson Dynamo had been a gifted scientist and engineer from the former Soviet Union.  He was commissioned by his government to create a powerful suit of armor that could rival the American hero, Iron Man.  This armor was able to generate its own massive amounts of electricity and wield it in various ways, including flight, super strength and the ability to fire electromagnetic bolts.  The Crimson Dynamo was deployed to the West to defeat Iron Man and destroy Stark Industries.  Iron Man triumphed following a fierce battle and The Crimson Dynamo defected to the United States fearing that he would be killed by his Soviet masters as punishment for his failure.  He eventually became Tony Stark’s friend and colleague and he sacrificed his life to foil a plot to assassinate Stark.  New versions of The Crimson Dynamo armor has been developed, piloted by a number of different individuals.  The Crimson Dynamo first appeared in Tales of Suspense #46.

blog.name: avengers-familyimagines
blog.title: Avengers Family Imagines
blog.description: I write platonic and romantic imagines and fics! involving the Avengers and other Marvel characters. Feel free to request something! Just as a heads up, Imagines I write are small things that are short and sweet and aren’t very descriptive while my Fics are more detailed and story-like.

summary: I am in utter disbelief. 10,005...10,005 of you that I love so much. It is near to the point that my heart is beating so fast....
body:
I am in utter disbelief. 10,005…10,005 of you that I love so much. It is near to the point that my heart is beating so fast. You guys have no idea how much I appreciate you all. Writing has been my passion for several years now, and now I can express it with Marvel. Marvel and you guys have saved me from a lot of things I won’t bore you with.

Can I just say…thank you. Thank you guys so much for this entire experience.

Can I just say…thank you. Thank you guys so much for this entire experience.

Can I just say…thank you. Thank you guys so much for this entire experience.

Can I just say…thank you. Thank you guys so much for this entire experience.

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: Service Dogs for Superheroes (SDfSH): Helping Kids Testify Against Their Perpetrators
title: Service Dogs for Superheroes (SDfSH): Helping Kids Testify Against Their Perpetrators
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2HspFQe

by literally_no_idea

Tony’s in his workshop when Peter comes in to talk to him. “Hey, Mr. Stark? Can I ask for a favor?”

Tony turns, shrugging. “Sure, what can I do for you, kid?”

“Well, I met this boy named Tommy, he’s 8 years old, and I’m really worried about him. I got him out of a bad situation, but I found out recently that he’s being asked to testify in court, and like, the news hasn’t really been kind, and neither has the community, so. I thought maybe you and Steve and everyone could go help with the crowd? I’ve seen biker gangs do it before, and I think having superheroes help would be really helpful too?”

–

This story discusses some heavy subject matter. Please read the tags, and feel free to skip this story if it might be triggering to you, you don’t need to read this part to understand and enjoy the rest of the series. There won’t be any service dog facts at the end of this story either.

Words: 1680, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 17 of Service Dogs for Superheroes (SDfSH)

summary: Marvel Cinematic Universe
title: Marvel Cinematic Universe
body:
• Iron Man - the grand daddy of them all 
  • Iron Man 2 - trash
  • Captain America: The First Avenger - mediocre but power through
  • Thor - ignore Natalie Portman, x2 attention to Tom HIddleston
  • The Avengers - yay!
  • Iron Man 3 - eh, thinks its more clever than it is
  • Thor 2: The Dark World - ignore Natalie Portman part 2, silly
  • Captain America: The Winter Soldier - Hail Hydra
  • Guardians of the Galaxy - fun!
  • Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 - less but more Fleetwood Mac
  • Avengers: Age of Ultron - what if James Spader was a robot
  • Ant-Man - you love bugs
  • Captain America: Civil War - yeehaw
  • Black Panther - oh lawd he coming
  • Doctor Strange - if House was a wizard
  • Spider-Man: Homecoming - Michael Keaton is BDE
  • Thor: Ragnarok - AAAA-AH! Great use of Led Zeppelin, dir. Taika
  • Ant-Man & The Wasp - more bugs to love
  • Avengers: Infinity War - Thor has the best entrance
  • Captain Marvel - the first female-centric film on this list :)
  • Avengers: Endgame - whatever it takes

(Skip Incredible Hulk)

blog.name: avengersacademyarchive
blog.title: That’s science!
blog.description:
An archive for Avengers Academy

Slight disclaimer, if that's even the right word because this may be self-evident: When gif sets and photo sets include a link to a source video, the source video isn't mine. If no link is included, that means the source is my own videos or screenshots.

summary: When the process of unlocking new characters was changed in version 2.0 of the game, we no longer got these kinds of gems....
body:
When the process of unlocking new characters was changed in version 2.0 of the game, we no longer got these kinds of gems.

Mission: Asgardian Grudge

-Build the Academy Banner

-Fake An Apology

-Repair Loki’s Reputation
